title: Governance Threshold Configuration Manifest (GTCM) State V2.0
description: Defines the mandatory dynamic thresholds governing the L4 COMMIT ARBITRATION stage, focusing on P-01 PASS criteria (S-01 Efficacy vs. S-02 Exposure).

config_version.description: Unique identifier for this specific configuration state snapshot (e.g., UUID or Git hash of the change that introduced it).

effective_timestamp.description: The UTC timestamp when these thresholds became active, crucial for auditable rollback.

S01_Efficacy_Threshold.description: The minimum required Efficacy Projection Score (S-01) for P-01 PASS determination.

S02_Risk_Tolerance.description: The maximum acceptable Systemic Risk Synthesis Score (S-02) for P-01 PASS determination.

AOC_Veto_Override.description: Flag reserved for Architect of Consensus (AOC) emergency veto override. Setting true must trigger high-priority logging and external alerts.
